---
title: "simCAT"
output: github_document
---

simCAT implements Computerized Adaptive Testing simulations with dichotomic 
items. The program selects items with Fisher Maximum Information method an randomy, 
with or without constrains (content balancing and item exposure control).

To install simCAT, use:

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github('alexandrejaloto/simCAT')
```

We will be happy to read your suggestions: alexandrejaloto@gmail.com.
